name: Uttar Pradesh National Rural Health Mission

details.Mission Objective: To improve the health status of rural population through integrated and community-based approach.
details.Key Programs: National Rural Health Mission, Janani Suraksha Yojana (JSY), National Maternity Benefit Bill
Target Outcomes: Infant Mortality Rate reduced to 30/1000 live births
Malaria mortality reduction rate 50% upto 2010, additional 10% by 2012
Key Initiatives: Establishment of District Health Mission Society (DHMS)
Implementation of Accredited Social Health Activist (ASHA) program
